 Creates a binary representation of an integer, lowest byte first.

Detailed Description

Contains the conversion functions.

Note that the xint::to<T> function is not here, because it's a template function and must be defined in a header file.

Todo:
the xint::to_string function could be made more efficient by using only doubledigit_t-sized pieces of the integer at a time, and dividing the whole thing by the total of the divisions done to get the digits. Same with the xint::from_string function.
